title: Smart Data Models - DiagramStyle
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The diagram style refer to a style used by the originating system for a diagram.  A diagram style describes information such as schematic, geographic, bus-branch etc.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiagramStyle

Diagram.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A DiagramStyle can be used by many Diagrams. Default: 'list'
